T02TD1221E:20b-3: dgyes pa rdo rje'i mandala gyi cho ga /
T02TD1221E:20b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1221E:20b-5: rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'u% zla ba'i gzi ltar dkar po bsams te /
T02TD1221E:20b-6: de las 'od zer dkar po spros pas lus bkang ste /
T02TD1221E:20b-7: sdig pa dag par bsams la /
T02TD1221E:20b-8: de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms la h'u% zhes brjod pas bdag nyid las kyi he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis par bsgom ste /
T02TD1221E:20b-9: de'i spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom dkar po bsams te /
T02TD1221E:21a-1: mar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du a'a:dmar po bsam /
T02TD1221E:21a-2: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'u% sngon po bsams la /
T02TD1221E:21a-3: aom a'a:h'u% raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1221E:21a-6: ba'i rnam lnga la sogs pa la aom a'a:h'u% bzlas la /
T02TD1221E:21a-7: aom badzra re khe h'u% zhes zlos shing /
T02TD1221E:21a-9: de nas lag pa bshal te thal mo sbyar nas phan yon brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1221E:21a-10: chu bcas lci ba sbyin pa yin //
T02TD1221E:21a-11: skyang nul byas pa tshul khrims yin //
T02TD1221E:21a-12: grog ma sogs bsal bzod pa yin //
T02TD1221E:21a-13: bya ba brtsams pa brtson 'grus yin //
T02TD1221E:21a-14: skad cig rtse gcig bsam gtan yin //
T02TD1221E:21a-15: ri mo snyoms pa shes rab yin //
T02TD1221E:21a-16: thub pa'i mandala byas pas pha rol phyin drug de dag rnyed par 'gyur //
T02TD1221E:21a-17: lha mi khyad par can skye zla ltar gzi 'phags shing //
T02TD1221E:21a-18: nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
T02TD1221E:21a-19: rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pa ldan par skye //
T02TD1221E:21a-20: des na bde gshegs mchog gi khyim du lus las bya //
T02TD1221E:21a-22: de nas lag pa g-yon pa sa la reg par byas la /
T02TD1221E:21a-23: aom badzra me d'i n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'u% zhes brjod pa tsam gyis sa gzhi de sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD1221E:21a-24: de nas me tog gi tshom bu dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1221E:21a-25: dbus su aom a'a:h'u% na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-26: zhes brjod de me tog dor ro //
T02TD1221E:21a-27: shar du ga% goo r'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-28: zhes bya bas me tog dor ro //
T02TD1221E:21a-29: lhor tsam tsoo r'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-30: zhes bya bas me tog dor ro //
T02TD1221E:21a-31: nub tu bam be t'a l'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-33: byang du gha% ghasma d'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-35: dbang ldan du pam pukka s'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-37: me mtshams su sam sa wa r'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-39: bden bral du lam tsanda l'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-41: rlung mtshams su ni dam dombi n'i na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21a-43: de dag ni me tog gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1221E:21a-44: de nas bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i h'u% las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs bug g-yon pa nas zhugs te /
T02TD1221E:21a-45: thugs ka'i padma la bsnun pa tsam gyis /
T02TD1221E:21b-0: thugs bskul nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes @21b pa rdo rje'i lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du sprul te /
T02TD1221E:21b-1: mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsams la /
T02TD1221E:21b-2: de'i 'od zer gyi sna la 'jus te 'ongs pa'i bgegs thams cad tshar gcad pa'i bsam pas h'um bzhis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD1221E:21b-3: de nas aom badzra goo r'i a'a k'arsha ya dza /
T02TD1221E:21b-4: aom badzra tsoo r'i pra be sha ya h'u%/
T02TD1221E:21b-5: aom badzra bett'a l'i bandha bam /
T02TD1221E:21b-6: aom badzra ghasma r'i ba sham ku ru ho:/
T02TD1221E:21b-7: zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi lha dgu me tog gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor la dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ste /
T02TD1221E:21b-8: yi ge brgya pas kyang brtan par bya'o //
T02TD1221E:21b-10: gti mug gis mnan 'gro bltas te //
T02TD1221E:21b-11: 'gro ba gti mug zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1221E:21b-12: rdo rje can gyi goo r'i mdzad //
T02TD1221E:21b-13: de bas goo r'i bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1221E:21b-14: zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro bltas nas //
T02TD1221E:21b-15: 'gro ba zhe sdang zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1221E:21b-16: rdo rje can gyi tsoo r'ir mdzad //
T02TD1221E:21b-17: de bas tsoo r'i bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1221E:21b-18: nga rgyal gyis mnan 'gro bltas nas //
T02TD1221E:21b-19: 'gro ba nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1221E:21b-20: gtso bos bett'a l'i gzugs mdzad //
T02TD1221E:21b-24: gtso bos ghasma r'i gzugs mdzad //
T02TD1221E:21b-26: bdag med ma dang gnyis med gzugs //
T02TD1221E:21b-28: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum bdag / rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1221E:21b-29: de nas yang aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a zhes bcom ldan 'das la mchod la /
T02TD1221E:21b-30: aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae a'ee ao aoo aam aa:zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod la /
T02TD1221E:21b-31: yang aom a'asht'a na n'a ya na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-32: aom pim gordha ke sha bartma n'a na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-33: aom tsa tu rbim sha ti nee tr'a ya na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-34: aom sho da sha bhu dz'a ya na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-35: aom krishna dzi m'u ta wa pu she na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-36: aom ka p'a la m'a la aa ne ka dha ri ne na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-37: aom a'adhma ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-38: aom aardhe ndu dam shti ne na ma:/
T02TD1221E:21b-39: zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad kyis mchod do //
T02TD1221E:21b-40: de nas nang dang phyi dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas kyang yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD1221E:21b-41: phyi rol gyi bya ba'i mchod pas kyang mchod la /
T02TD1221E:21b-42: aom a'a:h'u% zhes bzlas pa'i me tog dang mchod rdzas thams cad la bsnun pas /
T02TD1221E:22a-0: aom sarba sa sho dha ni h'u% phat sv'a h'a:zhes bya @22a * //
T02TD1221E:22a-1: bas dri chab kyis bsangs te /
T02TD1221E:22a-2: aom badzra ni ri ti h'um zhes bya bas zhabs bsil phul la /
T02TD1221E:22a-3: aom hri bi shuddha sarba dharm'a /
T02TD1221E:22a-4: sarba p'a pam nishtsa sam shodha ya /
T02TD1221E:22a-5: sarba bi kalpa aa pa na ya h'um zhes bya bas zhabs bsil phul /
T02TD1221E:22a-6: dza:h'um bam ho:kham ram zhes bya bas aa rgham phul la /
T02TD1221E:22a-9: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a:h'u%/
T02TD1221E:22a-11: aom badzra nee bi tye a'a:h'u%/
T02TD1221E:22a-12: aom badzra shapta a'a:h'u% phat sv'a h'a zhes bya bas go rims bzhin du me tog dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-16: sil snyan rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1221E:22a-17: gzhan yang dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams la bdag dbul bar bgyi lags kyis thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1221E:22a-18: de nas bstod pa nyi shu pas kyang bstod la /
T02TD1221E:22a-19: de nas sdig pa bshags par bya ste /
T02TD1221E:22a-20: ji srid thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar phyin ci log gi rtog pas bsags pa'i las bdag gis bgyis pa dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-21: bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshags shing phyis sdom par bgyid do //
T02TD1221E:22a-22: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD1221E:22a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-24: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD1221E:22a-25: bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i khams gsum bde ba chen por rnam par ro gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dgyes mdzad rdo rje dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-26: des gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-27: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i chos dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-28: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-29: de'i 'khor lo la 'khor bar gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs la bdag skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD1221E:22a-30: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD1221E:22a-31: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02TD1221E:22a-33: 'di dag ji srid mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD1221E:22a-34: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1221E:22b-0: sdig pa thams cad @22b so sor bshags //
T02TD1221E:22b-1: 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste //
T02TD1221E:22b-2: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD1221E:22b-4: de nas bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam 'di nyid la brten par bya'o //
T02TD1221E:22b-5: bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lus 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1221E:22b-6: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis bzhes su gsol zhes lus 'bul te /
T02TD1221E:22b-7: de nas smon lam gdab par bya ste /
T02TD1221E:22b-8: rigs skyes rjes su ma nyams shing //
T02TD1221E:22b-9: dam tshig can dgyes rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1221E:22b-10: snying rjer ldan zhing bla mar gus //
T02TD1221E:22b-11: skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig / lag na rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02TD1221E:22b-12: zab mo'i chos ni 'don pa dang //
T02TD1221E:22b-13: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can //
T02TD1221E:22b-14: skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig / he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas //
T02TD1221E:22b-15: sems can kun gyi don yang byed //
T02TD1221E:22b-16: he ru ka yi go 'phang mchog thob nas //
T02TD1221E:22b-17: sems can ma lus 'di la 'god cing 'jog par shog / de ltar bstod pa'i mchod sbyin las ni rdo rje rigs mchog tu ni bdag myur skye gyur cig / sems can phan phyir yang dag thabs kyis yon tan dang ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhin bdag gyur cig / rnal 'byor ma kun la ni dpe med bde ster rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du bdag gyur cig / phyag rgya drug gis bdag brgyan dur khrod gnas su tshangs par spyod dang ldan par bdag gyur cig / de'i 'og tu yi ge brgya pas cho ga kha bskang zhing bshags pa bya ste /
T02TD1221E:22b-18: aom badzra he ru ka sa ma ya /
T02TD1221E:22b-20: he ru ka tve no pa tishtha /
T02TD1221E:22b-22: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1221E:22b-23: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD1221E:22b-24: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1221E:22b-28: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02TD1221E:22b-29: bha ga wan sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me mu nytsa /
T02TD1221E:22b-31: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa h'u% phat:/
T02TD1221E:22b-33: ye shes lha aom a'a:h'u% badzra mu:/
T02TD1221E:22b-34: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1221E:22b-35: dam tshig gi lha bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la /
T02TD1221E:22b-36: me tog gi tshom bu dbus su bsdus nas /
T02TD1221E:22b-37: aom a'a:h'u% bzlas la gzhag go //
T02TD1221E:22b-38: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i mandala gyi cho ga /
T02TD1221E:22b-39: slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
